ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 102
ygData.msgSnippet: Then why haven t we seen any posts about gnomish fireworks?  If the person supposedly found the book, don t you think they would have sent in some pictures of
ygData.messageBody:
Then why haven't we seen any posts about gnomish fireworks? If the person
supposedly found the book, don't you think they would have sent in some
pictures of gnomish fireworks to some site somewhere? Or at the very least
showed it off to his/her friends or perhaps auctioned some over the auction
channel?

Rotgut




Message: 9
Date: Wed, 6 Oct 1999 12:09:53 -0500
From: "Oleg" <verl@...>
Subject: Re: Third book doesn't make sence...

The third book contains animated bait, firewater, collapsible fishing pole,
and Gnomish fireworks. All can be made

-----Original Message-----
From: lockjaw <lockjaw@...>
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, October 06, 1999 10:23 AM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Third book doesn't make sence...


>From: lockjaw <lockjaw@...>
>
>If there was a third book, it would seem logical that it would have
>recipies for things in it other than a collapsable fishing pole. So why
>aren't we seeing more tinkered items besides this pole come out of that
>book? Unless all the other formulas in it are broken.
>
>I suspect this is a wild goose chase, and someone, somewhere is having a
>good laugh at our expense.
>
>Rotgut
>
>>
